#summary vbox widget reference

= vbox widget =
A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkVBox.html GtkVBox] optionally packed inside a [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkScrolledWindow.html GtkScrolledWindow]
----

== Definition ==
{{{
<vbox tag_attr="value"...>
	widget...
</vbox>
}}}
"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==
See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkVBox.html#GtkVBox.object-hierarchy GtkVBox] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| margin || Surrounding blank space || An integer >= {{{0}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| scrollable || Scrolled window capability || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| height || Scrolled window dimension || An integer > {{{0}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| width || Scrolled window dimension || An integer > {{{0}}} || 0.7.21 ||

== Directives ==
None.

== Signals ==
None.

== Functions ==
None.

== Notes ==
This widget has a default spacing of 5 which can be overridden with the "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkBox.html#GtkBox--spacing spacing]" tag attribute.
----
